title: Automated Alerts for Health Monitoring
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want the ALFRED system to send me automated alerts for abnormal health readings so that I can manage my health efficiently and feel safe in my home.

title: Medication Adherence Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to provide me with personalized medication reminders and adherence tips so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.

title: Caregiver Communication Hub – Shared Health Updates and Alerts
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to receive shared health updates and alerts from my caregivers so that I can stay informed about my health status and ensure timely assistance in case of emergencies.

title: Emergency Response Coordination - Real-Time Health Status Sharing for Enhanced Safety
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my health in real-time and share my health status with my children and caregivers so that I can feel safer and ensure prompt assistance in case of an emergency.

title: Long-term Health Tracking – Personalized Summaries for Healthcare Consultations
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to receive personalized health summaries that I can share with my healthcare providers so that I can manage my health efficiently and ensure I am receiving the best care.

title: Voice-Guided Medication Instructions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want clear voice-guided medication instructions so that I can manage my health efficiently without confusion or anxiety about using technology.

title: Health Monitoring and Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me about my medication schedule and monitor my health so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.
